title: Mobile-based Project Design in Ubiquitous Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mobile device proficiency and basic social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Building flexible learning environments using mobile technology in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) settings and developing field-applicable projects

learning_goals: Learners can design learning environments that are not constrained by time or space using mobile technology
Learners can create social domain project proposals by applying ubiquitous learning principles
Learners can produce small-group team project outcomes using collaboration tools in BYOD environments

resources: Mobile Learning Management System (LMS) Access Permissions

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
